item.title: Toward NNGP and NTK
item.description: Papers NNGP Deep Neural Networks as Gaussian Processes NTK Wide Neural Networks of Any Depth Evolve as Linear Models Under Gradient Descent Reference Gaussian Distribution StackExchange - Product of two multivariate normal distribution NNGP Deep Gaussian Processes NTK Understanding the Neural Tangent Kernel By Rajat’s Blog Code for the blog rajatvd/NTK Ultra-Wide Deep Nets and the Neural Tangent Kernel (NTK) CMU ML Blog: Ultra-Wide Deep Nets and the Neural Tangent Kernel (NTK) Some Intuition on the Neural Tangent Kernel 直观理解Neural Tangent Kernel
